tweet: We’ve been looking forward to sharing more news with you this week about #Cardano’s exciting collaboration with #NewBalance. After an event in LA on Thursday evening, we can announce that New Balance has teamed up with #IOHK to create NB Realchain. Check:  https://t.co/qInEy1RNUY

And there it is, folks! @newbalance #realchain powered by #Cardano. Excited to be able to talk more about this project with the @Cardano community since I know that some were a little displeased that I could not do so before. Super proud of our team @InputOutputHK. Excelsior!  https://t.co/8wusJRiiit

I like #Cardano + New Balance partnership since people outside of crypto can experience blockchain technology.   Other companies facing the same problem with counterfeits notice that and might want the same solution.   Cardano adoption via real utility.

#IOHK will develop New Balance Realchain atop #Cardano #blockchain.   NB customers will receive a Realchain card with an embedded identity and can claim ownership of the shoes by entering a code printed on the tongue of the shoes into the app.    https://t.co/LF0B3cTmw7

What do you guys think of @NewBalance jumping into #Blockchain with a “New Balance Realchain.” built using the Cardano Blockchain?  Ground breaking, and bringing blockchain one step closer to mass adoption. Authentication of ownership. 🔥  C/O: @IOHK_Charles #ADA #Cardano #Crypto  https://t.co/OH13S0vhcJ
